Rybnik - LVM splitvg precodure

  1. Stop all applications.
  2. Wait for Kempe to bringdown the database.
  3. Wait for Kempe's okay to split.
  4. Execute the split
    1. Login to taryb055
      ssh taryb055
    2. Check all logical volumes are sync'd
      lsvg -l datavg02
    3. Document LVM status before the split
      lspv > lspv.beforesplitvg.out
    4. Execute splitvg on datavg02
      sudo splitvg -y forkempe -c2 -i datavg02
    5. Disable autovaryon for the new VG
      sudo chvg -a n forkempe
    6. Document LVM status after the split
      lspv > lspv.aftersplitvg.out
  5. Kempe to setup a reminder to let us know to destroy the copy on Tuesday04/11/2017
